mapper.select: SELECT gdsNum, gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateName, c.cateCodeRef, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg FROM tbl_goods g INNER JOIN tbl_goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE g.cateCode = #{cateCode} OR cateCodeRef = #{cateCode}

SELECT gdsNum, gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateName, c.cateCodeRef, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg FROM tbl_goods g INNER JOIN tbl_goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE g.cateCode = #{cateCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (gdsNum, userId, repNum, repCon) VALUES (#{gdsNum}, #{userId}, nextval(tbl_reply_seq) , #{repCon});
mapper.select: SELECT gdsNum, r.userId, m.userName, repNum, repCon, r.repDate FROM tbl_reply r INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE gdsNum = #{gdsNum} ORDER BY repNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart (cartNum, userId, gdsNum, cartStock) VALUES (nextval(tbl_cart_seq), #{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY c.cartNum DESC) AS num, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsThumbImg FROM tbl_cart c INNER JOIN tbl_goods g ON c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum WHERE c.userId = #{userId}
